website_summaries.verdict: The perfect choice when the maximum amount of comfort is a must-have.
pros: Extra thick foam and oversize padding offers extra comfort when sitting at a desk or computer for long periods of time
cons: Comes with a premium price tag

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality control
customer_reviews.text: Lazy-boy use to have better Quality products. This chair is very nice looking.. Assembly was easy, and he instructions were well written, but when I went to put the air piston in the base it was crooked due to poor workmanship, so the chair sits crooked. I’ll have to take the chair apart at some point and shim the air piston.
customer_reviews.author: Skeptic Critic

customer_reviews.title: Sliced and not by me
customer_reviews.text: Nice chair but had a slice in the back. For this price I want perfection. And no I did not cut the box open. I didn't even use scissors Now I am 2 for 2 I ordered 2 of these and they both have issues second chair has plastic all broken that is supposed to cover the mechanism under the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Jordain M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for gaming! Great quality and very comfy! I've had this chair for a few months now and I can say it's well worth the money. But, I did take one star off because the the back of the chair. It's sunken in and has very little padding and you can't get it back out.
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: Cheap casters and poor QC
customer_reviews.text: The casters are quite cheap and the cups the casters press into were not welded square on mine. This left a couple of the casters angled, and one off the ground. End result is they do not spin around to point in the direction of movement when the chair rolled. Contacted OEM for warranty replacement of the base due to caster issues and there was no response. The parts are packed in the OEM box with minimal protection, plastic wrap and laid on top each other.
customer_reviews.author: Itsa Me

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy from Millworks Holdings Company, Inc.
customer_reviews.text: Millwork Holdings Company is a joke. The chair looks great but I can't sit in it. There were no bolts shipped with the chair. I've called twice specifically orders the parts needed and both times they sent the wrong parts. The seat cushion and back make for really nice wall decorations but that's about it. Don't waste your money or your time with this company. They are bad news.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Halligan

customer_reviews.title: Poor craftmanship
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived prime in 6 days.Upon arrival appeared to be repackaged .All of the screws that held the legs on were stripped and fell out upon opening.One of the bolt receivers that hold the bottom and the back together would not receive the bolt.Unacceptable for a $250 on sale LAZYBOY.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Glisson

customer_reviews.title: Package came in absolutely destroyed many other parts for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Package came in absolutely destroyed many other parts for the cheer broken or damaged I called the very day that came in and still today I have not seen the replacement parts NOW I WOULD LIKE THE CHAIR REPLACED , I HAVE NOTHING TO SET ON.............
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Instant sturdy comfort!
customer_reviews.text: I have been eyeing this chair for a few years. Only regret is waiting so long to buy it. I have other Lazyboy furniture in my office and living room. This is on par with their excellent quality. Since being rear ended last July I have been in near constant pain and struggling to be comfortable. This chair instantly gave me so much support that my neck realigned. Priceless! Also, my legs are exceptionally long and on the higher settings I am extremely comfortable and do not feel crunched like I do on every other office chair.
customer_reviews.author: Ros P.

customer_reviews.title: La Z Boy for Tall People
customer_reviews.text: Chair is very nice looking and also comfortable. Delivered in time that was stated, and packaging was not the greatest. Just a heads up this chair as stated in the description is for big and tall individuals. I am 5 11" and with the chair at its lowest setting my feet just touch the ground. If you are smaller than that your feet may be dangling in the air. There are cheaper chairs out there but this La z Boy is the real deal. Would highly recommend this chair for an office setting, though i am using it at home for my computer chair.. Feels great on my aching back.
customer_reviews.author: SCOTT

customer_reviews.title: Caused lower back pain
customer_reviews.text: To be frank and to the point Chair is OK, but it caused me to have lower back pain. Part of its structural rigidity is a bar that goes across the back of the chair. The first 5 months I owned it the cushioning was great, but here on the 6th month it's lost its cushion and the bar presses into my back. I only weigh 240 pounds therefore I am not at any limit. I did remedy with an office chair back cushion. It would probably be wise to purchase one with this chair initially so you aren't disappointed later.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: I like big butts and comfortable chairs!
customer_reviews.text: It's comfortable and provides plenty of room for my derriere. It STAYS put at the height I've chosen with no sudden surprises that leave me nearly sitting on the floor (like my old chair). It appears to be well made, rolls perfectly leaving no marks on the laminate floors. Assembly went well and all parts were in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Foggy

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy these are returns!
customer_reviews.text: Stay away! These are returned chairs that they are selling! The box did not have scratches but the handles for the chair did. When I called the manufacturer they said there were 36 people ahead of me and when it got to 21 they hung up the line. These guys are definitely selling returned chairs for regular price.
customer_reviews.author: gold e.

customer_reviews.title: Made in China/ Lazyboy name only.
customer_reviews.text: poor quality material, will get destroyed withntime. Not as comfortable as old lazy boys. These chairs say Lazyboy but should say MADE IN CHINA! Why state there great and been making chair since for ever. Kept cutting off circulation to hamstring area.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos S.

customer_reviews.title: AVOID Due To Health Risks
customer_reviews.text: The chair that I received was full of mold and mildew (as per the warranty depart for the chair)! IT smelled and every time I sat in it and air was pressed out I began coughing and head would stop up severely! IT was returned to Amazon for a refund. BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: 54mm Napoleonics

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but has issues
customer_reviews.text: Like others have said, quality control is not great. Some parts were cosmetically damaged so that's annoying. It's a pretty comfortable chair though and it reclines far back for an office chair which I'm really into since I watch movies and game in this chair too. Aside from that, the back is short. I know the dimensions are there on the site but until I sit in it myself it's hard to tell if I'll like it. Finally, the website advertises it as 400lb capacity. It's 350lb capacity. Not an issue for me but if you're in that 350-400lb range, you need to know that before hand.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell G.

customer_reviews.title: Chair was not new, and is uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I received this chair with a heavily damaged box ~ a box which had been opened and badly taped back together. Obviously the chair had been out of the box and then reboxed. This is odd because the item was supposed to be new. I did unbox it myself and put it together, and it seems fine except for one arm screw that is stripped out. Now, the bad part ~ this chair is uncomfortable. The seat leans me forward too far, and I keep sliding toward the front. No thigh support. And the padding on the lower back is way too much. Even though I do like La-z-boy chairs, I would not buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: nice chair. But...
customer_reviews.text: this is a comfortable chair. I'm 6'3" 240lbs and it feels great to sit in a chair and not have back or leg pain after a couple hours. The negative things I have to say about this chair is the wheels are not good at all. I will definitely replace those. Also if you can buy this chair locally, go that route. I had to send mine back and get a replacement. this chair is kinda heavy and bulky and it will probably get damaged in shipping. both boxes were damage during shipment but luckily my replacement chair wasn't damaged or had missing parts.
customer_reviews.author: K.B.

customer_reviews.title: Just not happy
customer_reviews.text: Pretty terrible craftsmanship, as well as packaging. We're talking LaZBoy here! Come on!! Had I saw the broken support right away I probably would've sent this back and looked for a different company to buy my chair. I didn't though. It was the last part out of the box and I'm a pretty lazy guy. I'll see if I can get my money's worth out of it. It actually sits too high for my desk, so i will likely see if my 6' 2", 300 lb friend wants to buy it....
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality:  Fell apart, and the warranty is useless
customer_reviews.text: I owned this chair for 3 years. I bought another hoping that Amazon would swap them for me, because my old one fell apart. Amazon's and La-Z-Boy's buyer protections were useless. The upholstery developed multiple huge ugly gashes 18" long -- and it turns out the warranty for that is 1 year, not 10. The mechanism failed, and won't keep me upright. La-Z-Boy will send parts, but I can't disassemble the chair, tell them what's wrong, and reassemble it. Amazon's assembly person for my new chair said he could not fix the chair's mechanism. DO NOT TRUST LA-Z-BOY'S WARRANTY. They know what will break, and don't cover those items with their warranty!
customer_reviews.author: RKM

customer_reviews.title: Meant for TALL PEOPLE
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I will startle readers. This chair is Not meant for people who are under 6 foot tall.. this is a big and TALL chair.. I'm 6'4" 240lbs this chair is a gamer/ work from home wet dream. Easy to assemble, and came with no damage from shipping. My only negative thought about the chair is that the back is not tall enough for me. I'm tall, so I'm bummed that the head rest still only was shoulder high on me, but again that's me. So I state again, this chair is meant for tall people. If you at less than 6 foot, move along..
customer_reviews.author: J. Walikonis

customer_reviews.title: After 6 months shocks is giving way. I'm 280lbs ...
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months shocks is giving way. I'm 280lbs. Not impressed! I contacted manufacture and they stated they sold their company and wished me luck.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy and sleek looking
customer_reviews.text: Very nice chair. My husband weighs 265 lbs and fits him great. Very cushiony and comfortable. As a female, I was nervous about putting it together but it was pretty simple. It just looks like a big, comfy chair. The black leather is very nice and the chair looks very sleek. Also love the wood arms. Can’t beat the LaZBoy brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kris m.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This chair is perfect. I sit at a desk all day and previously bought a discount chair that was sub par. I bought this one in hopes that it would be better and I am very pleased. I’ve had it for a little over a month and my whole body feels better. I am 6’3” and 240 lbs, this chair is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M.

customer_reviews.title: Chair nice nice, but the casters are real garbage
customer_reviews.text: The chair is very nice, and was easy to assemble. It sits pretty high, even on the lowest setting. I am 6’3”, so that is not too much of @ problem for me. HOWEVER, the casters are real garbage. You cannot roll it in a straight line, even just under its own weight. I see why people buy this chair along with a set of aftermarket casters for it. Figure the additional $35 cost when budgeting your expenses for this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Jim_and_Denise

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Warranty
customer_reviews.text: The "faux leather" will crack and split within 6 months. Trying to get service on the "10 Year Warranty" is useless. "DO NOT BUY FROM THIS COMPANY!" I would rate a"ZERO" if available. Don't believe any of the positive reviews like I did.
customer_reviews.author: sniper-340

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfy but you might need to be taller or use a footrest
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely one of the most comfortable office chairs I have owned. This is a BIG and TALL chair! Seat height can be on the tall side for "normal" size users. I am six foot, and the seat at its lowest height is still a little stretch for my legs. I do use a footrest which does help. Quality of materials appears to be quite good, however only time will tell with use. So far after a few months I have no regrets on the little added expense for this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart R. Folk

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: ordered this chair and it came in a week. During assembling, we saw a couple of defects on the leather (small cuts) but did not pay attention, did not want to return such a huge thing! however, we still had to request an exchange of the chair because the armrest hardware was crooked and we could not attach it. We assembled the second chair quickly and without problems, the new chair arrived without defects.
customer_reviews.author: Nataliia

customer_reviews.title: Very study and well made and quit comfortable,
customer_reviews.text: This product was somewhat difficult for an older man to assemble but I managed with some difficulty. I am very well satisfied with this product. La-z-Boy is a great brand and I have a la-z Boy recliner and sofa they made and it has lasted for years. The chair looks very nice and is very comfortable. For the price and sturdiness of this chair I highly recommend it for your home office which is how I use the product.
customer_reviews.author: Tony D Whetsell

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: I started to assemble the new chair that arrived. One of the inserts meant to accept a screw is entirely too large. The screw falls right in without touching the threads. Now I have a half assembled chair and I am caller 16 on the customer service line. We will see how this goes.. Update, after being on hold for 30 minutes the CSR hung up as soon as I was transferred. I have tried to call 3 different times. After being on hold for more than 30 minutes, I was hung up on everytime. I have sent an email with no response. Terrible quality control and customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Hudson

customer_reviews.title: I have to say this is the best office chair I have ever had and I've had ...
customer_reviews.text: I sit at my desk for 6 plus hours everyday and I've had problems with my lower legs swelling and bottom hurting from sitting so long. I have to say this is the best office chair I have ever had and I've had a few. I've been using it now for 2 weeks and my legs have not been swelling and there's lots of padding in the chair so my bottom does not hurt. The quality of this chair was much better than I expected, with the base of the chair being wood. This chair is heavy, which really gives a feel of quality. I would recommend this chair and I would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If I only had one arm, this would be a five star review
customer_reviews.text: I knew there was an issue when I assembled it. Now I'm at a point where the left arm rest falls off pretty regularly where it attaches to the back rest. The connection is stripped and the bolt won't stay in. The overall quality of the cushion and the product itself was wonderful, but it won't stay together. 7 months ago, True Innovations gave me a confirmation # and the hope of replacement parts that never arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Jason S.

customer_reviews.title: Fairly good chair.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. Seat plate failed (part that moves and adjusts) in 1-1/2 years. Clicking and excessive rocking as metal to metal parts wore out. Contacted the seller and they graciously sent me a seat plate assembly free of charge. I've had many similar office chairs that have failed and no one ever offered a new, free part to fix them after 1-1/2 years of use. This speaks greatly for the chair and the vendor that stood beside it. I will order again.
customer_reviews.author: OldAnalogGuy

customer_reviews.title: Attractive chair, packaging left the bottom cushion warped
customer_reviews.text: This chair looks great, despite being bonded leather. It's a bit creaky and noisy and I don't think the leather will last more than a couple of years, but the cushioning is wonderfully comfortable. If you can get something with real leather, I would suggest that. As a side note, the chair's packaging came beat up and the box was in shambled. The bottom cushion has one side slightly flattened out more than the other, but not enough for me to try and return it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hussien

customer_reviews.title: The bonded leather starts to crack and flake away after a year of easy use.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'5" 265lb. Bought this Delano chair in Nov 2016, reviewing now in Nov 2019 Strong enough, but pretty uncomfortable in upper leg/thigh support. It creaks and squeaks too. The worst aspect is the bonded leather (see pics of seat and arms) that started coming apart after only a few months. It starts irritating your skin in those spots. I'm hoping to find replacement arms or figure out a fix (for a $400 chair). Pretty disappointed in my first ever La-Z-Boy product purchase. (NOTE: I removed the arm rest cushions and sat them on the bottom seat cushion near that degradation for the photo. Then I 'recovered' the armrest with nice brown dress socks and replaced them. ftw!)
customer_reviews.author: Christian Awesome

customer_reviews.title: Box destroyed.  Inside total disarray
customer_reviews.text: Base broken. Arms badly scuffed. Personal things of previous purchaser left in box. My last two chairs have been broken. Box totally destroyed. We have pictures We have been at our lake house for two weeks and just opened box. Neighbor has put it in our house.
customer_reviews.author: Jody smith

customer_reviews.title: Very Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair to replace one that had been used by my cats as a scratching pad. I read the reviews and was very hopeful it would meet my needs. This is one of the most uncomfortable chairs I've ever sat on. After a week my right leg started falling asleep after an hour or so. Fortunately my husband likes it so I passed it on to him. Now I have to find a chair for my use. One with a deeper seat.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bingham

customer_reviews.title: Needs better Casters
customer_reviews.text: I love this char. It is comfortable and easy to assemble. However, I haven't even used it one week and one of the casters broke, so I had to order new casters. I am not as heavy as the chair is built for and there is no reason for a caster to break so soon. This is the only reason I rated the chair a 4-star. Perhaps La-Z-Boy could invest in some casters that will hold the weight the chair is built for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain for a superior Executive Chair
customer_reviews.text: It took a long time to get this (about 2.5 months) from order date, however well worth the wait. Was well packaged and easy to put together. This chair is sturdy for my big build, rich looking and supremely comfortable. I work sometimes 11 hours a day at my desk with few breaks and this feels like it gives me the back and leg support that my previous chair has been lacking. I will let you know if it doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Loanshark

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable with some flaws...
customer_reviews.text: When they said "tall" the meant TALL. At the lowest setting, I'm at the same level as the highest setting on other chairs. On the highest setting, my feet barely touch the floor. And I'm 6'1". Also, the little screws that hold the wooden accents onto the chairs 5 legs (were you rest your feet) have begun to fall out. I flipped the chair over to re-insert the screws and found that almost all of them are stripped out. Note: There are 4 screws per leg and when they fall out... and they WILL fall out, the wooden accents fall off and the metal legs underneath have extremely sharp edges! Ask me how I know. :(
customer_reviews.author: Savop

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable for tall/big people.
customer_reviews.text: The La-Z-Boy Delano Big & Tall Man's chair seems very supportive and comfortable. I am 6'6" and weigh 260 pounds so I need a tall office chair that holds up well. This chair feels right for me as I use it 8-10 hours a day while working from home. It only took about 20 minutes to assemble also.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scrached Parts
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one on Prime Day. Arrived with minor scratches almost on all parts. Scratches on wood handles was like eyesore. Asked Amazon for exchange. Exchange arrived with minor scratches too (some parts, including wood handles.). Funny thing, exchange box in great condition, and bubble wrap undamaged. So, it seems had already had scratches when it was packed in the box. Absolutely unacceptable for such expensive chair. Paid double the price of competition for quality I was expecting. I guess you have to order 3 chairs to assemble one great one, and return two with damaged ones. Assemble instruction not perfect. Hard to attach handles. I recommend attaching handles first, and work around it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lazyboy - what can you expect
customer_reviews.text: Great Office Chair..... Swivals good, raises & lowers good, leather is great, soft and smooth. Just one problem issue and thats the wheels. They don't rool good. First complaint they said those wheels were for carpet (which was never said prior to purchase) then I changed wheels and these are supposed to be for tile and they still don't roll as smoothly as the chair I had on the same tile before. Nonetheless, the chair is great a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Ron M

customer_reviews.title: Pretty comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Got this chair because at the time I was around 315 lbs and this chair said it supports up to 400. The seating is comfortable for me and allows me to work from home for stretches of 5+ hours so far. The wheels roll great as well. The one downer is that for some reason the cushioning on the left arm already went a little flat after only about 6 weeks, not completely but can feel it. Mostly a minor annoyance.
customer_reviews.author: Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent comfort
customer_reviews.text: Excellent comfort with easy to use control settings - good lumbar support, firm but comfortable seat and a just right reline angle to relax. Assembly was simple and less than 30 minutes. Customer service exceeded my expectations - The back of my chair arrived with a small cut/tear - I called the service number, emailed a scan of invoice and pic of tear and a new back was shipped within 10 days. Great email communications.
customer_reviews.author: David Southard

customer_reviews.title: Chair has tilted since purchased and has gotten so bad after less than 2 years I need to replace it
customer_reviews.text: As I stated in the headline, this chair has tilted since purchased and has gotten so bad after less than 2 years I need to replace it. I have tried everything that I can to remedy this issue including buying replacement bolts to properly tighten it, having the company send me a new metal base (which isn't the issue), and completely disassembling and reassembling. My only thought at this point is that the housing for the hydraulic pump is loose and so the shaft moves. There is no way for me to remedy this short of replacing this chair entirely, which I will finally be doing. Save yourself the headaches and don't get a Lay-z-boy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Comfy at start, but this chair lost all padding in the seat, arms, and back within a few months. I extended another couple months with additional pads. As the chair is supposedly good for up to 350 lbs, you'd think that the padding would survive for at least a year. Even the supposed memory foam in it was useless.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel MG

customer_reviews.title: Typical high end Office Depot type desk chair.
customer_reviews.text: What do I mean by that? It's not an expensive chair as far as office furniture goes. No needle bearings, non greasable pivot pin. They usually last me a few years, and this one will as well. Very nice wood, very rich looking chair. One star off because it's already squeaking. Might be because it's new. About as good as it gets unless you spend 1,000 dollars. Not to be confused with Steel Case office furniture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Staggers

customer_reviews.title: The box was partially open and looked like it was falling apart
customer_reviews.text: Package: 3 Stars .... The box was partially open and looked like it was falling apart. Everything inside was fine, expect 2 nicks on the wooden arm frame the holds the wheels and a light mark on the back that is scratched. Shipping: 3 Stars .... Delayed twice - Via UPS Product: 4 Stars .... Super comfortable and very well built. Perfect everyday chair ! Install: 5 Stars .... Done in less than 30min... Everything fit perfect and easy to put together, didn't need instructions
customer_reviews.author: Erick Orta

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy but comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Having a bad back, this chair is good. Not amazing, but good enough. Assembly was pretty easy but the pieces are heavy so you'll need a table or assistant to help. Don't buy this chair thinking it will cure your desk back aching issues. The bottom is a tad short and sitting long hours can make the bottoms of your legs sore for those who have bad backs or sciatica like I do. With bad backs, it's tough to blame a chair because even the most comfortable chairs in the world won't make us happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Buffy

customer_reviews.title: One of the most comfortalbe desk chair I've found...
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased TWO of these chairs. One for work and one for home. Its comfortable enough for my bulk weight (not a light person) over several hours of sitting for my job. Its not perfect: - The casters can self destruct - The wood at the bottom of the chair can get scratched easily. - Assembling the arm pieces to the seat and back can induce swearing like a sailor. The casters are easily replaced, and its all worth it when you rear and back are not hurting after 3 straight hours of sitting behind a computer screen.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: so far so good.. could be the best office chair ive ...
customer_reviews.text: so far so good..could be the best office chair ive ever bought..its still new though...im 300+ pounds and it seems to be able to handle my fat a$$..went thru at least 2 office depot chairs..one wouldnt go up high enough and the other the hydraulic system gave out after 2 months..ofiice depot chairs SUCK! cant go wrong with la-z-boy brand...
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Poor manufacturing and return/exchange policy
customer_reviews.text: Understood Lazy-Boy was better quality. The base appears to be manufactured with defects and is not functional. I also gave the Support review a 1-Star as there was not an option to receive only the base. I now have to put all of this (the ENTIRE CHAIR) back in the box and re-package for return shipment
customer_reviews.author: B Ridings

customer_reviews.title: Cheap leather thats split in less than a month.
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. It is a very cheaply made product. Not even a month after purchasing, the sides of the leather started splitting and the color is coming off of the wood. You would think being a lazyboy and costing over $400 the chair would hold up under gentle normal use. Nope not this one. Its junk.
customer_reviews.author: N. C.

customer_reviews.title: Does not live up to expectations.
customer_reviews.text: This chair is rated at 500lbs. I weigh 365lbs. With in the first 3 months the cylinder started leaking down. Now it wont stay up at 6 months. The cable to operate the cylinder has broke. and two legs are cracked. I'd hate to see what a 500lbs person would do to this weak chair. Would not buy this thing again. I am surprised something with the La Z Boy name could fail so miserably.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm Glad I Purchased This Chair!!
customer_reviews.text: The seat of this chair is great. I sit in this chair for 10+ hours a day for work and pleasure and my butt never hurts. The cushion is so supportive and nice. The back of this chair is good. Although, it would be great if it had a feature to adjust the back forward, so I could sit up straighter and closer to the desk. I usually solve the issue by putting pillow behind my back in the chair. Other than that, this was a GREAT INVESTMENT.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Hodge

customer_reviews.title: HORRIFIC ASSEMBLY PROCESS
customer_reviews.text: The arms on this chair are HORRIBLE. The holes associated with the arms of the chair and the setup of the back and base of the chair just DO NOT align. It's literally off by over an inch. In addition the screws don't truly lock in. I've scratched the heck out of the chair's sides trying to get them aligned that I don't know if I'll have much resale value on this chair. After trying to assemble the chair for 4 hours I gave up. I think it's a two person job at a minimum. I will be calling their support and I might change my review at that point, but for now. The 2/5 stars stands.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Friedman

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this chair for over 6 months now without issue. A great quality chair that is very comfortable. I admit I’ve tilted back in it a few times and snoozed! Only complaints are that when the tilt is locked, the chair has a bit of a forward lean to it. Slick dress pants will tend to slide forward. Also, measure the height to the top of your thighs when sitting comfortably. This is important if you want to be able to roll under your desk while sitting. The lowest seat height setting is a bit higher than other chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: If casters do not swivel - ask to replace the base (not casters!).
customer_reviews.text: Really nice chair, especially for the price! It came with casters freely swiveling when lifted up, but not when rolling on the floor... Turns out - metal five-star piece has cylinders for inserting casters welded inclined, and therefore swiveling would work against chair plus person weight. If you complain - they'll offer casters replacement, which won't help. Ask to replace the base and TO MAKE SURE caster insertion cylinders are welded VERTICALLY. They did read my explanations, forwarded to the right tech, and I got nicely swiveling casters when rolling on the floor! Minus one star for sending bad one, but kudos for addressing.
customer_reviews.author: YE

customer_reviews.title: In my opinion this chair was extremely easy to put together despite the reviews I read that ...
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion this chair was extremely easy to put together despite the reviews I read that said otherwise. Additional it came with a T handle allen vs. most others that send the standard "finger buster" wrenches. I've used it for a few weeks and am very happy with it. I'm 6'2, 270lbs with most of my height in my torso and this chair has made working from home a relaxing experience. If you're on the fence, make the jump.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: It was time for a new chair in my retrofitted work from home cuz of Covid office. My old chair was literally falling apart, and since I just found out I'll be working from home for another 6 months, it was time to invest in a real chair. This is the real deal. Lazyboy has a great reputation for a reason. There is real furniture, incredibly comfortable, gorgeous leather, and looks awesome in the office. Sure it's not $119 at Staples, but sometimes, you really do get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Richard M. Rolon

customer_reviews.title: Make sure your big and tall.
customer_reviews.text: I am 6'2 and 250 pounds and this chair makes me feel like a kid at times. My heels don't touch the ground when leaned back so this causes my feet to swell but outside of that It's soft and comfortable and it doesn't feel cheap at all. Pretty awesome chair but just make sure your really bigger and taller then me.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto

customer_reviews.title: a few months in and it is very comfortable. I'm a bigger guy and have no issues ...
customer_reviews.text: Waited for a while to actually try it out before I reviewed it. So, a few months in and it is very comfortable. I'm a bigger guy and have no issues with it either supporting me or feeling like the chair is delicate. Very solid. Putting together was easy. No big issues. A few minor imperfections but non that are visible. I go through chairs like one a year. We will see if this does better. It's already doing much better than the last one.
customer_reviews.author: DaWoolf

customer_reviews.title: La-Z-Boy Delano office chair
customer_reviews.text: La-Z-Boy Delano office chair is very well made. The chair has a vey nice seat adjustment - up to over 24 inches...perfect for the very tall, perfect for the short person who needs a raised height when working on the computer. The chair is very comfortable, with tilt , recline, and rocking features. La-Z-Boy makes an exceptional chair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for the price
customer_reviews.text: The chair looks good but the quality is lacking for this price. One of the arms I recived was misaligned it still fit but took some bending to so and the finishing plug does not fit flush. The seat feels as if it slopes foward a lot and there is no adjustment for this part of the chair. Lastly there is already play in the connection between the seat and shaft of the base.
customer_reviews.author: BLC

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Wheels. Would like a credit for replacement wheels.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and comfortable chair. The wheels on the other hand, are absolutely awful. CHEAP! $300 chair and they saved money here? If I'd known I would have bought the Serta. They won't rotate and drag across my hardwood floors. I ordered another set of rollerblade wheels to replace them but wonder why I have to she'll out another $30 for better wheels. How about a credit Amazon?
customer_reviews.author: Zacrac

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts. Can’t assemble.
customer_reviews.text: The chair came, holes in the box, missing 4 out of 10 screws, missing 2 out of 4 washers and I can’t use the chair I just bought. Extremely disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: A great looking and comfortable chair for big guys.
customer_reviews.text: We were happy to note that the wood finishes on this chair are actually real wood! It makes it a bit heavier than a lot of chairs, but it's beautiful to look at. As you would expect from La-Z-Boy, it's very comfortable. My spouse is a big guy and this chair supports his frame very easily without feeling and looking like it has reach its maximum capacity. It was also very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy chair - needed a replacement for the ratty one I had at my computer desk and this one was definitely an upgrade. Assembly instructions were very clear. I have had it for about 9 months and it has held up very nicely. Plan on having it for a long time. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Scott H.

customer_reviews.title: It's fine if you want to replace it in 2 years.
customer_reviews.text: Chair was nice enough when I bought it in 2018. Two of the wood pieces would not hold due to stripped screws, but some wood filler solved that. Fast forward to today. The "leather" on the seat has cracked and peeled away. The cracking and peeling stated about 4 months ago. Before this chair I regularly bough $120 chairs that would last around 3-4 years, so a $300 chair that did not even make it 3 is really not acceptable. I highly recommend avoiding any product made with "bonded leather". It is junk.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Amazing chair! Finally one that's worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing chair! I have tried many different chairs and all have failed one way or the other, before trying this one. I like it so much, so I ordered two of them (I have an office and a small music studio at home). I'm a big guy (6' 3" and 280lbs). This chair is solid!!! Super nice quality and very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda S.

customer_reviews.title: This is the most comfortable office chair I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable office chair I have ever had! You will not be sorry if you order one. I did buy the silicone wheels (Office Chair Caster Wheels for All Floors -...zitriom) to go on this chair and they glide so easily on my vinyl floor. The chair would be just as comfortable with the original wheels but I wanted the extra protection for my floor.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: It is so comfortable and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I recd my chair today and after 2 hours of putting it together, I am sitting in it now! It is so comfortable and beautiful! I had a little trouble with 2 of the screws on the bottom of the seat cushion that attaches to the back of the chair. But after that, I was almost at the finish line. I only had to attach the arms of the chair to the body of the chair as the last thing to do! Yippeee! I definitely recommend this chair and would buy it again! I will see how well it holds up in the months and years to come!
customer_reviews.author: carrie jefferson

customer_reviews.title: decent chair but had damage in transit.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable chair but had some scuffed wood from transit. I called and sent email to company a few times. With the virus I gave them time a couple weeks each time have not heard anything. Everything works as it should though and it is nice to sit in for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Bloecker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect chair for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair after a mesh-backed chair I purchased broke after a month. This new chair is solid and very comfortable. It was easy to assemble, but it took an extra hand to get the chair into the base. That's normal, according to the instructions. I highly recommend this chair for anyone, not just big and tall.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about all the other reviews but had this about a month and it built like a tank well made and comfortable. The wheels are cheap so I purchased roller blades wheels and changed them out
customer_reviews.author: Kingtutts...

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful chair but it's a $400 piece of crap. I keep sliding out of it and the back won't tilt unless you prop your feet up on something. Another expensive danged chair going to goodwill ☹
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable chair.
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable, excellent sitting chair. My issue was the right arm bolt would not tighten. The hole / bolt is not stripped (it tightens without the arm on the chair). I swapped bolts between the arms and all is good now. The plastic covers over the bolts are flaking color, revealing a silver base, which is not attractive. Will reach out to company for new ones.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Heddinger

customer_reviews.title: The packaging was beaten up pretty badly, but amazingly none of the components of ...
customer_reviews.text: The chair arrived on time as promised. The packaging was beaten up pretty badly, but amazingly none of the components of the chair were missing or damaged. Also, the box/chair is fairly heavy, so unpacking the box and moving the pieces independently to the assembly location was helpful. This chair is on our second floor, so I assembled it upstairs. All pieces fit well and appeared to be of very good quality. The chair is very comfortable and I'm glad every time I sit down in it that I chose this chair. Love the chair!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking chair but poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking chair but the design is a joke. The arms of the chair attach to the base of the chair with screws that are way too short to adequately secure the arms to the chair. If you rise out of the chair and use the arms of the chair for some support, the screws disengage and the arm falls out. And yes I did use the screws the directions said to use. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: frank morello

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Some of these reviews are fake or from other vendors. Plastic mpunting plate? NO! Ive been 350#, had these chairs for 3 years of heavy usage, and no issues other than some squeeking once a year or so that wd40 takes care of. Bonded leather? Yeah, description says so. Only damage is from puppy who loves to chew on these. Will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and great looking in my home office.
customer_reviews.text: Chair arrived a couple days late due to current events, however carton arrived in good condition. All parts were included, directions were clear, took me about 30 minutes to assemble, there was no damage to any part of the chair. I did not experience any of the issues I read in previous reviews. Chair is beautiful, sits straight all mechanisms work as described, and above all is very, very comfortable. I’m a big guy and it is perfect for a large framed person. Love it and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D.

customer_reviews.title: The worst chair I have ever purchased. Avoid!
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment! I thought La-Z-Boy was a quality name. Boy was I wrong! The first chair I received was crooked! More than an inch higher on the left side than the right. I sent it back and it was replaced. The next chair does not maintain its height adjustment. I will be sitting in it and randomly I will just start going down to the bottom. That almost is sort of funny if I am in an important meeting and just start sinking at random! What a piece of junk!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chair sits high
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice comfortable chair and easy enough to assemble, but it sits too high for a regular size desk. It's about 1 1/2 inches higher than my other chair. It is wider than a regular chair, but I would think it will still go down far enough to accommodate any desk.
customer_reviews.author: LANTANARANCH

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat Disappointed by Lazy Boy
customer_reviews.text: I am somewhat disappointed by my new Lazy Boy office chair. I bought it to use at home, while I'm working from home. I wanted a nice comfortable chair because I spend long hours sitting at my computer. I was very pleased initially, but after a week or so of use I didn't get the same level of support and comfort as I initially did. The memory foam cushioning just isn't firm enough. Other than that I like the chair, its appearance, and its features. Given the price and Lazy Boy reputation, I expected better.
customer_reviews.author: Basil Ray Jones

customer_reviews.title: Overall an excellent chair
customer_reviews.text: This chair is pretty easy to setup, is very sturdy and is an excellent choice for big and tall people. The only reason I give it four stars instead of five is because of the covering which is synthetic and is not as comfortable as genuine leather would be. Still for the selection of big and tall chairs available this one I feel is the best choice by far. Overall it is an excellent chair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a wide butt!
customer_reviews.text: Put this together the other day and things went smoothly. I was able to get it upstairs on my own. It looks great- high quality, sleek design, comfortable. It’s great for a wide butt so I’m happy!
customer_reviews.author: K. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for a big and tall guy!
customer_reviews.text: I’m 6’4 and 250lbs. This chair is a huge improvement over my Old standard office chair. It’s taller, wider and the cushioning is incredible! My back and hips are so much happier!
customer_reviews.author: Ross W

customer_reviews.title: Good chair, questionable manufacturing
customer_reviews.text: The chair is extremely comfortable and about as easy as any other office chair to put together. You can tell the padding is higher quality than the $150 variants you find at Costco. Fits the big bodies nicely. It was however quite crooked once completed (tried multiple times to reassemble and align everything, once you start tightening the arm rests it goes into the same position however). Had to break it down a couple of times and add some strategically placed washers to get the thing sitting level. I wanted to give it 3 stars for the shoddy alignment but it is quite comfortable and well built otherwise, so 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew F Brown

customer_reviews.title: Grows on you.
customer_reviews.text: At first I was not sure if I liked it. Probably because I was used to my old chair. However, after a day or two I have come to really like it. It is comfortable and very sturdy. Looks like the seat padding will hold up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Olle Gladso

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable BUT some problems
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable BUT some problems, It is comfortable but one of the main problems is that it squeaks when I rock in it, one of the reasons I bought it was cause of the rocking ability, but no matter how much grease and oil I put on it, it still squeaks after a short time, I've even taken the bottom part off the chair and oiled every part I could, and still after a few days it squeaks again, grrrrrr. the other problem is that it sets crooked, a bit annoying. I would return it but not worth the trouble to send an item this big back. I would NOT recommend this chair to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tocohead

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Box arrived in timely matter but was damaged. Nothing missing or damaged inside. Went together easily, holes lined up. Tall, comfortable chair - I am 6-4, 205 and I use it two to three hours per day. Squeaks a little now but not an issue. Home office/man cave use. Does not roll easily on my 12x12 tile floor but instructions state the casters are designed for carpet?
customer_reviews.author: Frank J Knott

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Big and comfy! Assembled in 30 to 40 minutes without assistance. Comfort I have always associated with La-Z-Boy products. Most comfortable office chair I have had - and I have had many chairs. I am 6'-2", 265 pounds, but my petite 5'-4" wife loves it as well!
customer_reviews.author: Karl D. Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Ok, I guess - perhaps just not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Solid Not really all that cushy - incase you were looking for that Kills my left rear after about 4 hours. It looks nice I guess? Guess I was just expecting it to blow my mind or something.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: This is a La-Z-Boy?
customer_reviews.text: Hard to assemble. Lift failed in less then a week. Chair looks great, but uncomfortable. I really cant believe its a LaZBoy. Two stars, and thats generious!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Monroe

customer_reviews.text: chair great, all parts there, my grandson put it together in about an hour.Delivery wasn't so hot, the 50 year old female driver just wanted the box out of the truck. After seeing I was alone, she did help me get it to the front door. Chair sets kinda high. I still see it as a 5.
customer_reviews.author: tom seabury

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, stylish, nice construction....BUT the hydraulic is FAILING
customer_reviews.text: I like the chair overall for fit, comfort, and looks, BUT the hydraulic mechanism is failing after just one year! I raise to my desired level, and slowly the hydraulic lowers to the very bottom level within minutes. Very disappointed and will need to see about the manufacturer warranty and how to get this piece replaced.....hoping it won't be too much trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: La-Z-Boy makes the most comfortable chairs!
customer_reviews.text: My husband gave me one for my birthday and liked it so much I ordered one for his birthday. These chairs turn 360* and tilt slightly. The leather is a beautiful color and very soft. We love them!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl L. Cloyd

customer_reviews.title: Returned - would not recommend purchasing!
customer_reviews.text: This chair was a piece of garbage. I did a lot of research before buying and read this was supposed to be a great desk chair. WRONG. It has very little seat cushion, and one of the plastic wheel parts arrived cracked. I only put up with the uncomfortable chair for 2 days before I decided that the mid-three hundreds spent on it was NOT worth it at all. I would not recommend this chair to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Wright About It

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Junk, very disappointed. Makes we question the authenticity of these reviews. Came with many cheap and broken parts, no instructions, rip on the "leather" which is more like pleather. Very poorly constructed and very cheap materials. I actually question whether this is really a La Z Boy or a Chinese knock-off.
customer_reviews.author: JMatthews

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quilty
customer_reviews.text: May 7, 2018, and it front where the bend in your legs come is worn out and the leather is all cracked, really poor guilty. John Shane 860-512-0565
customer_reviews.author: John D Shane

product_meta.title: La-Z-Boy Delano Big & Tall Executive Office Chair | High Back Ergonomic Lumbar Support, Bonded Leather, Brown | 45833 model
product_meta.description: Color:BrownBring premium comfort and support to your home or office with the La-Z-Boy Delano Big & Tall Executive Office Chair. Upholstered in soft bonded chestnut brown leather with hand-sculpted real wood arms and base, this swivel chair offers an elegant blend of traditional style and modern performance that enhance any office, home, or entertainment space. A big and tall design ensures you have ample room at your desk, while a contoured back lumbar panel and advanced memory foam cushion layering system deliver comfort and support in the areas you need it most. Ergonomic and adjustable, this high back office chair allows you to control the height, tilt, and lift to suit your sitting position, providing optimized body alignment to ensure you remain comfortable and properly supported while sitting for long periods.
feature_bullets: Chair dimensions – 32.3” D x 28” W x 48 H | Chair weight – 55.2 lbs. | Weight limit – 350 lbs. | Seat adjustment: 22” - 25” H | Seat dimensions – 21.5” W x 21” D | Back height – 27” | Arms adjustments – 28.75” - 31.75” H
Fully adjustable height, recline, and tilt settings
Ergonomic office chair with memory foam cushioning that contours to your body
Sturdy components surpass rigorous BIFMA testing standards and supports up to 350 pounds
Chestnut brown bonded leather upholstery with rich mahogany-stained wood | Heavy duty casters

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars697 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
